title: Arcaddia
author: Arcaddia
content: Hello there! I am looking for a community manager or social media manager position. A little about myself: I've got a financial background (2 years as a financial advisor), I have over 4 years of crypto experience as the Head of community management/social media manager and a year of editor in chief and I have been into crypto since 2012 (mining, investing, trading). I have a lot of experience with Telegram, twitter, facebook reddit, bitcointalk, medium, youtube, discord, and instagram. I also speak french and can help translate/build a community in french. Telegram username: AkaSnakeWill gladly provide my CV and all the channels I am managing over telegram.Thanks!
